title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Prestige
description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Batman Begins
description: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring.

title: The Hobbit
description: A reluctant Hobbit sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.
